action.item: CREATE TABLE burnP3Plus_GreenUp(GreenUpID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ScenarioID INTEGER, Season INTEGER, GreenUp INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3Plus_Curing(CuringID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ScenarioID INTEGER, Season INTEGER, Curing INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE burnP3Plus_FuelLoad(FuelLoadID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ScenarioID INTEGER, Season INTEGER, FuelLoad DOUBLE)
